60ab922cb2533963e0cf8cf17a121918500c9369.commit.message:
JSPWIKI-304: make Workflow attributes Serializable

As Context isn't Serializable, on save page Tasks we pass it as a constructor parameter instead of passing it through the Workflow attributes' map.
60ab922cb2533963e0cf8cf17a121918500c9369.commit.author.name: juanpablo
